OtherComments.Content: Unmapped Proportional Figures This script will insert ten unmapped glyphs for Proportional Figures (pnum) and compose them from the default figures. The glyphs and side-bearings will need to be designed to suit the figure style.

GlyphInsertGlyphs.GlyphNames: zero.pnum, one.pnum, two.pnum, three.pnum, four.pnum, five.pnum, six.pnum, seven.pnum, eight.pnum, nine.pnum,
